name: Zombie Hunter, Inc.
description: In Zombie Hunter, Inc., you play as a zombie hunter-for-hire who rescues stranded survivors -- for a reasonable fee, of course. Protecting the survivors from zombies is important, but thereâ€™s more than just the undead lurking the streets of Washington, DC.
